text: Victoria Jamieson is an American author and illustrator of children's books, known for Roller Girl (2015), a graphic novel about roller derby. When Stars Are Scattered, co-authored with Omar Mohamed, was shortlisted for the 2020 National Book Award for Young People's Literature. ==Bibliography== * Olympig! (2012) * Pest in Show (2013) * Roller Girl (2015) * Pets on the Loose! The Great Pet Escape (2016) * Pets on the Loose! The Great Art Caper (2017) * All's Faire in Middle School (2017) * When Stars Are Scattered, co-authored with Omar Mohamed (2020) ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:American women children's writers Category:American women illustrators Category:American children's writers Category:American children's book illustrators Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Victoria Jamieson
